modelyear.desciption: Model Year in the request allows for the decoding to specifically be done in the current, or older (pre-1980), model year ranges.

manufacturer.desciption: Name or id of the vehicle manufacturer.

vehicle_type.desciption: The type name or id of the vehicle.

name: get_manufacturer_details
description: This provides the details for a specific manufacturer that is requested.

manufacturer.desciption: Name or id of the vehicle manufacturer.

name: get_makes
description: This returns all the Makes in the vPIC dataset for a specified manufacturer or vehicle type.

manufacturer.desciption: Name or id of the vehicle manufacturer(manufacturer and vehicle_type can not both be None).

year.desciption: Year From and Year To range cover the specified year.

vehicle_type.desciption: The type name or id of the vehicle(manufacturer and vehicle_type can not both be None).

name: get_vehicle_types
description: Get vehicle types for make by name or id.

name.desciption: The make name(name and id can not both be None).

id.desciption: The make id(name and id can not both be None).

name: get_models
description: This returns the Models in the vPIC dataset.

name.desciption: The make name(name and id can not both be None).

id.desciption: The make id(name and id can not both be None).

year.desciption: Refers to a specific year for which vehicle models are being considered or queried in the vPIC dataset.(when name is not None, year and vehicle_type can not both be None).

vehicle_type.desciption: The type name or id of the vehicle(when name is not None, year and vehicle_type can not both be None).

name: get_vehicle_variables
description: This provides a list of all the Vehicle related variables that are in vPIC dataset.

name: get_vehicle_variable_values
description: This provides a list of all the accepted values for a given variable that are stored in vPIC dataset.

variable.desciption: The variable you want to query.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.desciption: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
